dmca.title: DMCA Complaints
dmca.body:
EMAIL

http://music.blogdig.net/archives/articles/July2007/09/Willie_Nelson_in_Vancouver__6_29_2007___Review_.html#13f009a2928c1194a3ac13102cc291f6

**This complainant already has a signature on file with us. Below is the latest email request:
Google, Inc.
> Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
> [private]
> Mountain View, CA [private]
> Fax: [private]
> Re: Plagiarized/Copyright Content Theft
>
> To whom it may concern:
>
> I am writing to file a charge that music.blogdig.net is in violation of
> U.S. copyright laws. Our signature is on file with Google.
>
>
> Search Query: "Pacific Coliseum has played host to the biggest names"
>
> Please note that there are other queries that generate this result.
>
>
> The infringing article was posted on July 9, 2007 at 11:57 PM, and it
> can be found at:
>
> http://music.blogdig.net/archives/articles/July2007/09/Willie_Nelson_in_Vancouver__6_29_2007___Review_.html
>
>
> The copyrighted work at issue is posted here:
>
> http://www.musicbox-online.com/reviews-2007/willie-nelson-vancouver-07092007.html
>
>
> Please note: This is related to the item identified in DMCA violation
> notice 47.0. This is an aggregator. However, it it includes portions
> of our copyrighted work, but it credits the full article on the blog
> identified in DMCA violation 47.0. This therefore does not constitute
> fair use.
>
>
>
>
>
>
> The posting of these materials infringes upon the copyrights of me and
> my company The Music Box. I may be contacted at the email address and
> phone number listed below.
>
>
> music.blogdig.net can be reached at:
>
> [private]@blogdig.net
>
>
> I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
> described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized
> by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
>
> I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
> notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
> authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
> allegedly infringed.
>
> Sincerely,
>
>
>
>
>
> [private]
> Editor, The Music Box
> [private]@musicbox-online.com
> [private]
>
